        Returns:

      • getTo

        LinphoneAddress getTo()
        Get destination address of the LinphoneChatMessage.
        Returns:
        the LinphoneAddress in the To field of the message.

      • getExternalBodyUrl

        java.lang.String getExternalBodyUrl()
        Linphone message can carry external body as defined by rfc2017
        Returns:
        return external body url null if not present.

      • setExternalBodyUrl

        void setExternalBodyUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Linphone message can carry external body as defined by rfc2017
        Parameters:
        url - ex: access-type=URL; URL="http://www.foo.com/file"

      • addCustomHeader

        Returns:

      • isRead

        boolean isRead()
        Returns wether or not the message has been read
        Returns:
        true if it has been read, flase otherwise

      • isOutgoing

        boolean isOutgoing()
        Returns wether the message has been sent or received
        Returns:
        true if the message has been sent, false if it has been received

      • getFileTransferInformation

        LinphoneContent getFileTransferInformation()
        Get the file_transfer_information (used by call backs to recover informations during a rcs file transfer)
        Returns:
        a pointer to the LinphoneContent structure or NULL if not present.

      • setAppData

        void setAppData(java.lang.String data)
        Sets data in the chat message
        Parameters:
        data - to store in the message

      • getAppData

        java.lang.String getAppData()
        Returns:
        the data stored in the chat message if any, else null

      • setFileTransferFilepath

        void setFileTransferFilepath(java.lang.String path)
        Set the path to the file to read from or write to during the file transfer.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file to use for the file transfer.

      • downloadFile

        int downloadFile()
        Start the download of the file referenced in a LinphoneChatMessage from remote server.

      • setListener

        void setListener(LinphoneChatMessage.LinphoneChatMessageListener listener)
        Set the callbacks associated with the LinphoneChatMessage.

      • putChar

        void putChar(long character)
      throws LinphoneCoreException
        Fulfill a chat message char by char. Message linked to a Real Time Text Call send char in realtime following RFC 4103/T.140 To commit a message, use #linphone_chat_room_send_message
        Parameters:
        character - T.140 char
        Throws:
        LinphoneCoreException

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Frees the underlying native resource of the message. It should not be accessed afterwards. This is for optimizing the memory resources at runtime. Not calling this does not result in a memory leak.

      • isSecured

        boolean isSecured()
        Get if the message was encrypted when transfered
        Returns:
        whether the message was encrypted when transfered or not

      • reSend

        void reSend()
        Resend the message
